00037 inline void not_implemented(const Nom& chaine)
00038 {
00039   Cerr << chaine << " is not implemented yet to the Ptscotch API." << finl;
00040   Process::exit();
00041 }
00042 
00043 Implemente_instanciable_sans_constructeur(Partitionneur_Ptscotch,"Partitionneur_Ptscotch",Partitionneur_base);
00044 
00045 Partitionneur_Ptscotch::Partitionneur_Ptscotch()
00046 {
00047   nb_parties_ = -1;
00048   use_weights_ = 0;
00049 }

00054   exit();

00063 
00064 void Partitionneur_Ptscotch::set_param(Param& param)
00065 {
00066   param.ajouter("nb_parts",&nb_parties_,Param::REQUIRED);
00067   param.ajouter_condition("(value_of_nb_parts_ge_1)_and_(value_of_nb_parts_le_100000)","The following condition must be satisfied : 1 <= nb_parties <= 100000");
00068   param.ajouter_flag("use_weights",&use_weights_);
00069 }

00072 {
00073   return Partitionneur_base::lire_motcle_non_standard(mot,is);
00074 }

00076 void Partitionneur_Ptscotch::associer_domaine(const Domaine& domaine)
00077 {
00078   ref_domaine_ = domaine;
00079 }
00080 
00081 //
00082 //
00083 //
00084 //! Calcule le graphe de connectivite, appelle le partitionneur<br>et remplit elem_part (pour chaque element, numero de la partie qui lui<br>est attribuee).
00085 void Partitionneur_Ptscotch::construire_partition(IntVect& elem_part, int& nb_parts_tot) const
00086 {
00087 #ifndef PTSCOTCH_
00088   Cerr << "Ptscotch is not compiled with this version. Use another partition tool like Tranche." << finl;
00089   Process::exit();
00090 #else
00091   if (!ref_domaine_.non_nul())
00092     {
00093       Cerr << "Error in Partitionneur_Ptscotch::construire_partition\n";
00094       Cerr << " The domain has not been associated" << finl;
00095       exit();
00096     }
00097   if (nb_parties_ <= 0)
00098     {
00099       Cerr << "Error in Partitionneur_Ptscotch::construire_partition\n";
00100       Cerr << " The parts number has not been initialized" << finl;
00101       exit();
00102     }
00103 
00104 // Cas particulier: si nb_parts == 1, METIS ne veut rien faire...
00105 // ToDo: I don't know is that's the case with Ptscotch
00106   if (nb_parties_ == 1)
00107     {
00108 
00109       int nb_elem = ref_domaine_.valeur().zone(0).nb_elem();
00110       elem_part.resize_array(nb_elem);
00111       elem_part = 0;
00112       return;
00113     }
00114 
00115   if (ref_domaine_.valeur().zone(0).nb_elem() == 0)
00116     return;
00117 
00118   Cerr << "Partitionneur_Ptscotch::construire_partition" << finl;
00119   Cerr << " Construction of graph connectivity..." << finl;
00120   Static_Int_Lists graph_elements_perio;
00121 // const Domaine& dom = ref_domaine_.valeur();
00122   Domain_Graph graph;
00123   graph.construire_graph_elem_elem(ref_domaine_.valeur(), liste_bords_periodiques_,
00124                                    use_weights_,
00125                                    graph_elements_perio);
00126 
00127 
00128   const int n = ref_domaine_.valeur().zone(0).nb_elem();
00129   int* partition = new int[n];
00130 
00131   SCOTCH_randomReset();
00132   SCOTCH_Dgraph scotch_graph;
00133   SCOTCH_dgraphInit(&scotch_graph, Comm_Group_MPI::get_trio_u_world());
00134   SCOTCH_dgraphBuild(&scotch_graph,
00135                      0,             //!< baseval               , base first indice 0
00136                      n,   //!< vertlocnbr            , nb of local graph nodes
00137                      n,   //!< vertlocmax            , should be set to vertlocnbr for graphs without holes
00138                      graph.xadj.addr(),    //!< vertloctab[vertnbr+1] , index vertex table
00139                      0,             //!< vendloctab            , index end vertex table if disjoint, set to zero
00140                      graph.ewgts.addr(), //graph.ewgts,  //!< veloloctab            , graph vertices loads, set to zero
00141                      0,     //!< vlblocltab            , vertex label array : global vertex index
00142                      graph.xadj[n],       //!< edgelocnbr            , number of edges
00143                      graph.xadj[n],       //!< edgelocsiz            , same as edgelocnbr if edgeloctab is compact
00144                      graph.adjncy.addr(),        //!< edgeloctab[edgelocnbr], global indexes of edges
00145                      graph.edgegsttab.addr(),   //!< edgegsttab            , optional, should be computed internally, set to zero
00146                      0); //!< edloloctab            , graph edges loads, set to zero
00147 
00148   SCOTCH_Strat scotch_strategy;
00149   SCOTCH_stratInit(&scotch_strategy);
00150 
00151   SCOTCH_dgraphPart(&scotch_graph,nb_parties_,&scotch_strategy,partition);
00152 
00153 
00154   SCOTCH_stratExit(&scotch_strategy);
00155   SCOTCH_dgraphExit(&scotch_graph);
00156 
00157   MD_Vector_tools::creer_tableau_distribue(ref_domaine_.valeur().zone(0).md_vector_elements(), elem_part);
00158   for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00159     elem_part[i] = partition[i];
00160 
00161   delete [] partition;
00162 
00163 // Correction de la partition pour la periodicite. (***)
00164   if (graph_elements_perio.get_nb_lists() > 0)
00165     {
00166       Cerr << "Correction of the partition for the periodicity" << finl;
00167       corriger_bords_avec_liste(ref_domaine_.valeur(),
00168                                 liste_bords_periodiques_,
00169                                 0,
00170                                 elem_part);
00171       Cerr << "  If this number is high, we can improve the splitting with the option use_weights\n"
00172            << "  but it takes more memory)" << finl;
00173     }
00174 
00175   Cerr << "Correction elem0 on processor 0" << finl;
00176   corriger_elem0_sur_proc0(elem_part);
00177   elem_part.echange_espace_virtuel();
00178 
00179 #endif
00180 }
